item.title: Auf Dem Wasser Zu Singen
item.description: Excerpts from Les Contes d'Hoffmann, I Due Foscari, La Gioconda, Lohengrin, Arabella, Aida, Un Ballo in Maschera

item.title: Rare and Well Done
item.description: Excerpts from Robert le Diable, Le Prophete, La Boheme, Oberon, L'Amore dei Tre Re, Henry VIII, I Gioielli della Madonna, Giovanna d'Arco, Aroldo

item.title: I'm Not Making This Up You Know!
item.description: Excerpts from Die Frau Ohne Schatten, Daphne, Vanessa, Il Trovatore, Suor Angelica and La Forza del Destino

item.title: Now Hold On Just a Damn Minute!
item.description: Selections from Tristan und Isolde, Don Giovanni, Fidelio, Elektra, Aida, La Fanciulla del West
